name: public-circle-mcp-server
description: MCP server for Public Circle project - exposes project files, search, and safe shell commands to LLMs

templates.name: Project File
templates.description: Read a file from the project repository

templates.name: Code Search
templates.description: Search for a pattern across the project

tools.name: shell_command
tools.description: Execute allowlisted shell commands (rg, ls, cat, sed, awk, grep, find, head, tail, wc)

tools.name: search_code
tools.description: Search for a pattern across the project codebase

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the contents of a project file

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List contents of a project directory
